5 Protocol structures... */

31#ifndef DHCP_H
32#define DHCP_H
33
34#define DHCP_UDP_OVERHEAD (20 + /* IP header */ \
35 8) /* UDP header */
36#define DHCP_SNAME_LEN 64
37#define DHCP_FILE_LEN 128
38#define DHCP_FIXED_NON_UDP 236
39#define DHCP_FIXED_LEN (DHCP_FIXED_NON_UDP + DHCP_UDP_OVERHEAD)
40 /* Everything but options. */
41#define BOOTP_MIN_LEN 300
42
43#define DHCP_MTU_MAX 1500
44#define DHCP_MTU_MIN 576
45
46#define DHCP_MAX_OPTION_LEN (DHCP_MTU_MAX - DHCP_FIXED_LEN)
47#define DHCP_MIN_OPTION_LEN (DHCP_MTU_MIN - DHCP_FIXED_LEN)
48
49struct dhcp_packet {
50 u_int8_t op; /* 0: Message opcode/type */
51 u_int8_t htype; /* 1: Hardware addr type (net/if_types.h) */
52 u_int8_t hlen; /* 2: Hardware addr length */
53 u_int8_t hops; /* 3: Number of relay agent hops from client */
54 u_int32_t xid; /* 4: Transaction ID */
55 u_int16_t secs; /* 8: Seconds since client started looking */
56 u_int16_t flags; /* 10: Flag bits */
57 struct in_addr ciaddr; /* 12: Client IP address (if already in use) */
58 struct in_addr yiaddr; /* 16: Client IP address */
59 struct in_addr siaddr; /* 18: IP address of next server to talk to */
60 struct in_addr giaddr; /* 20: DHCP relay agent IP address */
61 unsigned char chaddr [16]; /* 24: Client hardware address */
62 char sname [DHCP_SNAME_LEN]; /* 40: Server name */
63 char file [DHCP_FILE_LEN]; /* 104: Boot filename */
64 unsigned char options [DHCP_MAX_OPTION_LEN];
65 /* 212: Optional parameters
66 (actual length dependent on MTU). */
67};
68
69/* BOOTP (rfc951) message types */
70#define BOOTREQUEST 1
71#define BOOTREPLY 2
72
73/* Possible values for flags field... */
74#define BOOTP_BROADCAST 32768L
75
76/* Possible values for hardware type (htype) field... */
77#define HTYPE_ETHER 1 /* Ethernet 10Mbps */
78#define HTYPE_IEEE802 6 /* IEEE 802.2 Token Ring... */
79#define HTYPE_FDDI 8 /* FDDI... */
80#define HTYPE_INFINIBAND 32 /* IP over Infiniband */
81#define HTYPE_IPMP 255 /* IPMP - random hw address - there
82 * is no standard for this so we
83 * just steal a type */
84
85/* Magic cookie validating dhcp options field (and bootp vendor
86 extensions field). */
87#define DHCP_OPTIONS_COOKIE "\143\202\123\143"
88
89/* DHCP Option codes: */
90
91#define DHO_PAD 0
92#define DHO_SUBNET_MASK 1
93#define DHO_TIME_OFFSET 2
94#define DHO_ROUTERS 3
95#define DHO_TIME_SERVERS 4
96#define DHO_NAME_SERVERS 5
97#define DHO_DOMAIN_NAME_SERVERS 6
98#define DHO_LOG_SERVERS 7
99#define DHO_COOKIE_SERVERS 8
100#define DHO_LPR_SERVERS 9
101#define DHO_IMPRESS_SERVERS 10
102#define DHO_RESOURCE_LOCATION_SERVERS 11
103#define DHO_HOST_NAME 12
104#define DHO_BOOT_SIZE 13
105#define DHO_MERIT_DUMP 14
106#define DHO_DOMAIN_NAME 15
107#define DHO_SWAP_SERVER 16
108#define DHO_ROOT_PATH 17
109#define DHO_EXTENSIONS_PATH 18
110#define DHO_IP_FORWARDING 19
111#define DHO_NON_LOCAL_SOURCE_ROUTING 20
112#define DHO_POLICY_FILTER 21
113#define DHO_MAX_DGRAM_REASSEMBLY 22
114#define DHO_DEFAULT_IP_TTL 23
115#define DHO_PATH_MTU_AGING_TIMEOUT 24
116#define DHO_PATH_MTU_PLATEAU_TABLE 25
117#define DHO_INTERFACE_MTU 26
118#define DHO_ALL_SUBNETS_LOCAL 27
119#define DHO_BROADCAST_ADDRESS 28
120#define DHO_PERFORM_MASK_DISCOVERY 29
121#define DHO_MASK_SUPPLIER 30
122#define DHO_ROUTER_DISCOVERY 31
123#define DHO_ROUTER_SOLICITATION_ADDRESS 32
124#define DHO_STATIC_ROUTES 33
125#define DHO_TRAILER_ENCAPSULATION 34
126#define DHO_ARP_CACHE_TIMEOUT 35
127#define DHO_IEEE802_3_ENCAPSULATION 36
128#define DHO_DEFAULT_TCP_TTL 37
129#define DHO_TCP_KEEPALIVE_INTERVAL 38
130#define DHO_TCP_KEEPALIVE_GARBAGE 39
131#define DHO_NIS_DOMAIN 40
132#define DHO_NIS_SERVERS 41
133#define DHO_NTP_SERVERS 42
134#define DHO_VENDOR_ENCAPSULATED_OPTIONS 43
135#define DHO_NETBIOS_NAME_SERVERS 44
136#define DHO_NETBIOS_DD_SERVER 45
137#define DHO_NETBIOS_NODE_TYPE 46
138#define DHO_NETBIOS_SCOPE 47
139#define DHO_FONT_SERVERS 48
140#define DHO_X_DISPLAY_MANAGER 49
141#define DHO_DHCP_REQUESTED_ADDRESS 50
142#define DHO_DHCP_LEASE_TIME 51
143#define DHO_DHCP_OPTION_OVERLOAD 52
144#define DHO_DHCP_MESSAGE_TYPE 53
145#define DHO_DHCP_SERVER_IDENTIFIER 54
146#define DHO_DHCP_PARAMETER_REQUEST_LIST 55
147#define DHO_DHCP_MESSAGE 56
148#define DHO_DHCP_MAX_MESSAGE_SIZE 57
149#define DHO_DHCP_RENEWAL_TIME 58
150#define DHO_DHCP_REBINDING_TIME 59
151#define DHO_VENDOR_CLASS_IDENTIFIER 60
152#define DHO_DHCP_CLIENT_IDENTIFIER 61
153#define DHO_NWIP_DOMAIN_NAME 62
154#define DHO_NWIP_SUBOPTIONS 63
155#define DHO_USER_CLASS 77
156#define DHO_FQDN 81
157#define DHO_DHCP_AGENT_OPTIONS 82
158#define DHO_AUTHENTICATE 90 /* RFC3118, was 210 */
159#define DHO_CLIENT_LAST_TRANSACTION_TIME 91
160#define DHO_ASSOCIATED_IP 92
161#define DHO_SUBNET_SELECTION 118 /* RFC3011! */
162#define DHO_DOMAIN_SEARCH 119 /* RFC3397 */
163#define DHO_VIVCO_SUBOPTIONS 124
164#define DHO_VIVSO_SUBOPTIONS 125
165
166#define DHO_END 255
167
168/* DHCP message types. */
169#define DHCPDISCOVER 1
170#define DHCPOFFER 2
171#define DHCPREQUEST 3
172#define DHCPDECLINE 4
173#define DHCPACK 5
174#define DHCPNAK 6
175#define DHCPRELEASE 7
176#define DHCPINFORM 8
177#define DHCPLEASEQUERY 10
178#define DHCPLEASEUNASSIGNED 11
179#define DHCPLEASEUNKNOWN 12
180#define DHCPLEASEACTIVE 13
181
182
183/* Relay Agent Information option subtypes: */
184#define RAI_CIRCUIT_ID 1
185#define RAI_REMOTE_ID 2
186#define RAI_AGENT_ID 3
187#define RAI_LINK_SELECT 5
188/* not yet assigned but next free value */
189#define RAI_RELAY_PORT 19
190
191/* FQDN suboptions: */
192#define FQDN_NO_CLIENT_UPDATE 1
193#define FQDN_SERVER_UPDATE 2
194#define FQDN_ENCODED 3
195#define FQDN_RCODE1 4
196#define FQDN_RCODE2 5
197#define FQDN_HOSTNAME 6
198#define FQDN_DOMAINNAME 7
199#define FQDN_FQDN 8
200#define FQDN_SUBOPTION_COUNT 8
201
202/* Enterprise Suboptions: */
203#define VENDOR_ISC_SUBOPTIONS 2495
204
205#endif /* DHCP_H */
